value:
$WmMPID_比翼ヒノカ,ch05_26_Hinoka_FF_Pair,Face|So we are to dress as pirates...all just
to battle over some treasure? I'm not
so sure about this...$k$p$nMPID_カミラ|I wonder what the treasure is! If we
get a nice prize, you know who we
should give it to, don't you?$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|Oh! Yes, that's a great idea! I already
feel more motivated to win...$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ビーゼ,ch11_21_Wiese_F_Pirate21,Face|Treasure, huh? I bet Tormod would
appreciate a share of that. I'll just
have to collect it for myself...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_比翼ヒノカ,ch05_26_Hinoka_FF_Pair,Face|Our opponents are no easy targets,
but I won't lose here! Let's make our
retreat to regroup, Princess Camilla!$k$p$nMPID_カミラ|Hee hee... Getting into the spirit
of things, are we? The fun is only
just beginning!$k$p$Sbs150|
